name: To Heaven And Back (Chirpy)
description:
A fast paced time trail racing game where the goal is to complete each track in as little time as possible.

Each track has a certain number of goals, Collect all of them to complete a lap. After 3 laps the run is finished!

HOWEVER!!

You have a life bar which can be used in multiple ways. You can spend your life to give yourself a big boost in speed and complete the tracks even faster! Your life bar also keeps you alive off the track, letting make cuts and shortcuts off the path to cut down time to a minimum!

Be careful, running out of all your life will lead to you dying instantly!

Will you risk your life to the very last bit to get the smallest time possible? Or die trying.

<------------CONTROLLS------------>

MOVE - W,a,s,d

BOOST - Space bar

UP - W

DOWN - S

PAUSE/BACK - Escape
